name: Sentinel 343 Heavy Duty Degreaser
description: Sentinel 343 Heavy Duty Degreaser is a biodegradable, water-soluble degreaser that is an excellent alternative to traditional petroleum or hazardous solvents. Sentinel 343 is highly concentrated with superior degreasing properties and has a specialized blend of water soluble solvents, wetting agents and emulsifying agents to create this heavy-duty degreaser.
